name: Crazed Cosmonaut
description: Have you ever been frustrated with your meal? You spent your hard earned money and it still tastes nasty. Well look no further, a russian astronaut has the same problem, vent your frustrations on this russian space station, break, smash, destroy everything in your path! You are in a russian spaceship eating food… but the food is kind of suspicious… It has poison in it!!!! Unable to control your anger, you let your intrusive thoughts win and make it your goal to break, destroy and demolish everything in your path in order to survive!
